items.sentence: Tom\'s parents didn\'t want him to become a used car salesman.
Just because he likes painting doesn\'t mean he\'s good at it.
Tom is the only one in our family who has ever studied French.
Tom is the only person I know besides me who likes to do that.
Tom knew he barely had enough time to do what he needed to do.
Tom knew that Mary was likely to not do anything he suggested.
I heard that a South American camper was eaten by an anaconda.
Tom brings his children with him to work once or twice a year.
I have two sons. One is in Boston and the other is in Chicago.
Tom came to Japan eight and a half years ago with his parents.
